verses.text: KO eni ‘a e ngaahi fononga ‘o ha‘a ‘Isileli ‘i he‘enau ‘alu atu mei ‘Isipite, fakakongakau, ‘o taki kinautolu ‘e Mōsese mo ‘Ēlone.
Pea na‘e tohi ‘e Mōsese ‘i he fekau ‘a Sihova ‘a ‘enau ngaahi hiki fononga ‘i he‘enau ‘alu atu: pea ko eni ia ‘a e ngaahi hiki fononga ‘i he‘enau ‘alu.

Pea nau hiki mei Lamesisi ‘i he ‘uluaki māhina, ‘i hono ‘aho hongofulu mā nima ‘o e ‘uluaki māhina, ‘i he pongipongi hili ‘a e Pāsova na‘e ‘alu atu ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, mo e nima kuo hiki tā, ‘o mamata ki ai ‘e he kakai ‘Isipite kotoa.
Lolotonga ‘oku fai ‘e he kau ‘Isipite ‘a e tanu ‘enau ‘olopo‘ou tangata, ‘a ia kuo taa‘i ‘e Sihova: pea kuo fakamāumatea foki ‘e Sihova honau ngaahi ‘otua.
Pea hiki ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli mei Lamesisi, ‘o nau fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Sūkote.
Pea nau hiki mei Sūkote, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i ‘Ētami, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he ve‘e toafa.
Pea nau hiki mei ‘Ētami, ‘o nau afe mai ki Piheloti, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he potu hahake ‘o Pealisefoni, pea nau fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he hāngai ki Mikitoli.
Pea nau hiki mei he potu hahake ‘o Hēloti, ‘o nau a‘a ‘i he tahi ki he toafa: pea nau ‘alu ‘i he toafa ‘o ‘Ētami ko e vaa‘i hala ‘o e ‘aho ‘e tolu, ‘o nau fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Mala.
Pea nau hiki mei Mala, ‘o nau a‘u ki ‘Ēlimi: pea na‘e tu‘u ‘i ‘Ēlimi ha matavai ‘e hongofulu mā ua, mo e fu‘u paame ‘e fitungofulu; pea nau fokotu‘u tēniti ai.
Pea nau hiki mei ‘Ēlimi, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ki he Tahi Kulokula.
Pea nau hiki mei he Tahi Kulokula, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he Toafa ‘o Sini.
Pea nau hiki mei he Toafa ‘o Sini, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Tōfika.
Pea nau hiki mei Tōfika, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i ‘Ālusi.
Pea nau hiki mei ‘Ālusi, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Lefitimi, ‘a ia na‘e ‘ikai ai ha vai ki he inu ‘a e kakai.
Pea nau hiki mei Lefitimi, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he Toafa ‘o Sainai.
Pea nau hiki mei he Toafa ‘o Sainai, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Kipelote-hataava.
Pea nau hiki mei Kipilote-hataava, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Heseloti.
Pea nau hiki mei Heseloti, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Lītima.
Pea nau hiki mei Lītima, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Līmoni-pelesi.
Pea nau hiki mei Līmoni-pelesi, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Līpina.
Pea nau hiki mei Līpina, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Lisa.
Pea nau hiki mei Lisa, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Kehelata.
Pea nau hiki mei Kehelata, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he mo‘unga ko Sefa.
Pea nau hiki mei he mo‘unga ko Sefa, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Hālata.
Pea nau hiki mei Hālata, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Maka-heloti.
Pea nau hiki mei Maka-heloti, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Tāhati.
Pea nau hiki mei Tāhati, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Tela.
Pea nau hiki mei Tela, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Mīteka.
Pea nau hiki mei Mīteka, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Hasimona.
Pea nau hiki mei Hasimona, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Moseloti.
Pea nau hiki mei Moseloti, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Peni-siakani.
Pea nau hiki mei Peni-siakani, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Hoa-hakitikati.
Pea nau hiki mei Hoa-hakitikati, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Siotipata.
Pea nau hiki mei Siotipata, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i ‘Apilona.
Pea nau hiki mei ‘Apilona, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i ‘Esionikepa.
Pea nau hiki mei ‘Esionikepa, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he Toafa ‘o Sini (ko Kētesi ia).
Pea nau hiki mei Kētesi, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he mo‘unga ko Hoa, ‘i he tafafonua ‘o ‘Ītomi.

Pea ‘alu hake ‘a ‘Ēlone ko e taula‘eiki ki he mo‘unga ko Hoa, ‘i he fekau ‘a Sihova, ‘o ne pekia ai, ‘i hono fāngofulu‘i ta‘u ‘o e ‘alu ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli mei ‘Isipite, ‘i hono nima ‘o e māhina mo e ‘uluaki ‘aho ‘o e māhina.
Pea na‘e fe‘unga ‘a ‘Ēlone mo e ta‘u ‘e teau mā uofulu mā tolu ‘i he‘ene pekia ‘i he mo‘unga ko Hoa.
Pea ko Tu‘i ‘Ālati ko e ‘eiki Kēnani na‘e nofo ‘i he feitu‘u ko Tonga ‘i he fonua ko Kēnani, na‘a ne fanongo ki he ha‘u ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli.
Pea nau hiki mei he mo‘unga ko Hoa, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Salamona.
Pea nau hiki mei Salamona, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Pūnoni.
Pea nau hiki mei Pūnoni, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i ‘Ōpote.
Pea nau hiki mei ‘Ōpote, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i I‘i-‘apalemi ‘i he tafafonua ‘o Moape.
Pea nau hiki mei I‘i-‘apalemi, ‘o nau fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Tīponi-kata.
Pea nau hiki mei Tīponi-kata, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i ‘Alamoni-tipilataimi.
Pea nau hiki mei ‘Alamoni-tipilataimi, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i he ‘otu mo‘unga ‘o ‘Apalemi, ‘i he potu hahake ‘o Nipo.
Pea nau hiki mei he ngaahi mo‘unga ‘o ‘Apalemi, ‘o nau fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i ‘Alapā-Moape, ‘i he ve‘e Soatani fe‘unga mo Sielikō.
Pea nau fokotu‘u tēniti ki Soatani mei Pete-sisimoti, ‘o a‘u ki ‘Ēpeli-sītimi ‘i ‘Alapā-Moape.
Pea folofola ‘a e ‘Eiki kia Mōsese ‘i ‘Alape-Moape, ‘i he ve‘e Soatani fe‘unga mo Sielikō, ‘o pehē,
Lea ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, pea ke tala kiate kinautolu, Ka mou ka laka atu ‘i Soatani ki he fonua ko Kēnani,
pea te mou kapusi ‘a e kakai kotoa ‘o e fonua mei homou ‘ao, pea te mou faka‘auha ‘enau ngaahi maka tongitongi kotoa, pea faka‘auha ‘enau ngaahi ‘īmisi kuo haka, mo holoki ‘enau ngaahi sia.
Pea te mou puke ‘a e fonua ‘o nofo ai, he kuo u foaki kiate kimoutolu ‘a e fonua te mou ma‘u.

Pea te mou tufa ‘a e fonua ‘i he talotalo, ‘o fakatatau ki homou ngaahi fāmili; ki he tokolahi te mou vahe tofi‘a lahi, pea ki he toko si‘i te mou vahe tofi‘a si‘i: ko e me‘a ‘e tonu ki ha taha ‘i he talotalo ‘e ‘o‘ona pē ia; ‘e fakamatakali pē ho‘omou ma‘u tofi‘a.

Pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou kapusi kinautolu ‘oku nofo ‘i he fonua mei homou ‘ao, pea ko kinautolu ‘oku mou fakatoe te nau hoko ko e ngaahi tala ‘i homou mata, mo e ngaahi tolounua ‘i homou vakavaka, pea te nau fakakina kimoutolu ‘i he fonua ‘oku mou nofo ki ai.
Pea ‘e iku pehē, ko e me‘a na‘a ku fakakaukau ke fai kiate kinautolu te u fai kiate kimoutolu.
